Name: Travelers Ring
Description: A simple bronze ring that brings luck to weary wanderers.

Abilities.Name: Enduring Fortune
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, reroll a failed skill check.

Name: Cloak of Muffled Steps
Description: A dark cloak that dulls sound, aiding in stealth.

Name: Lucky Coin
Description: An old, well-worn coin said to bring luck.

Abilities.Name: Fortunes Favor
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, flip a coin to reroll a failed attack roll. Heads: Success.

Name: Talisman of Minor Protection
Description: A small wooden charm blessed by a local priest.

Abilities.Name: Blessed Ward
Abilities.Effect: +1 to Defense rolls against undead enemies.

Name: Wanderers Scarf
Description: A lightweight scarf that protects against dust and wind.

Abilities.Name: Weather Resistance
Abilities.Effect: Ignore penalties from harsh weather conditions.

Name: Pocket Compass
Description: A small, reliable compass that always points north.

Name: Amulet of Lesser Clarity
Description: A simple amulet inscribed with a rune of focus.

Name: Rope Belt
Description: A sturdy rope repurposed as a belt, useful in a pinch.

Name: Charm of Minor Healing
Description: A charm infused with faint restorative energy.

Name: Simple Lockpicks
Description: A small set of rudimentary lockpicks.

Name: Lantern Pendant
Description: A pendant shaped like a tiny lantern, faintly glowing.

Abilities.Name: Guiding Light
Abilities.Effect: Once per encounter, reveal hidden enemies within 3 spaces.

Name: Gamblers Die
Description: A loaded die that somehow never rolls a one.

Abilities.Name: Lucky Streak
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, reroll a roll of 1.

Name: Tinkers Monocle
Description: A small monocle that enhances detail work.

Name: Herbal Satchel
Description: A small pouch filled with common medicinal herbs.

Abilities.Name: Herbal Remedies
Abilities.Effect: Once per floor, reduce poison duration by 1 turn.

Name: Hunters Token
Description: A carved bone charm carried by seasoned hunters.

Name: Hunters Token
Description: A carved bone charm carried by seasoned hunters.

Name: Brawlers Knuckles
Description: Reinforced leather wraps for stronger unarmed strikes.

Name: Messengers Band
Description: A thin bracelet worn by couriers for speed.

Name: Thiefs Gloves
Description: Black gloves that enhance dexterity.

Name: Crystal Earring
Description: A shimmering earring said to protect the mind.
